title: Stove Tile, late 17th century
creditline: Gift of the Estate of James Hazen Hyde
description: Relied: under an arch supported by columns a female figure in feather skirt, holding shield and arrow, seated on a tortoise (or armadillo); crested with shield and two figures.

tombstone.epitaph:
Stove Tile, late 17th century.
late 17th century. Green-glazed earthenware. Gift of the Estate of James Hazen Hyde. 1960-1-73.
